p: For URF02/A, the second ancestor form was HIV-1 CRF02_AG CA [ 32, 33]. In one case, URF02/A virus was isolated from PWID from the city of Norilsk with HIV diagnosed in 2008 (Krasnoyarsk 79), and in the other from a 48-year-old woman from the city of Krasnoyarsk (Krasnoyarsk 44). The woman reported the HS route, and HIV was diagnosed in August 2017.
